nodes.text: A slot machine was a gambling game popular in casinos. The Canto Casino of Cantonica had several slot machines. The Canto Casino's slot machines had a quantum-layered carbonite shell which prevented tampering.

In 34 ABY, during Resistance members Finn's and Rose Tico's mission to Canto Bight, the alien Dobbu Scay mistook the droid BB-8 as a slot machine for his likeness. The droid ended up accumulating many of Scay's Cantocoins.
